name: #filter
tagline: Facebook Chrome Extension - built at the 2014 Facebook Waterloo Hackathon
body:
### What is it?
A reminder to think twice about what you post. 

### How To Install:
```
Download 
Unzip
Open up Google Chrome
Go to [chrome://extensions](chrome://extensions)
Check off "Developer Mode"
Click "Load Unpacked Extension"
Select the entire downloaded folder

Ta-da, that's it! The extension should be enabled and running.
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
